[30;1m202 | [0m[35m            two kernels: ``"Local"`` and ``"NonZeroRandom"``.[0m
[30;1m203 | [0m[35m            The local kernel conducts a bit-flip local transition between states.[0m
[30;1m204 | [0m[35m            The local kernel generates a random qubit site and then generates a random[0m
[30;1m205 | [0m[35m            number to determine the new bit at that qubit site. The ``"NonZeroRandom"`` kernel[0m
[30;1m206 | [0m[35m            randomly transits between states that have nonzero probability.[0m
[30;1m207 | [0m[35m        num_burnin (int): number of MCMC steps that will be dropped. Increasing this value will[0m
[30;1m208 | [0m[35m            result in a closer approximation but increased runtime.[0m

[30;1m106 | [0m[35mA C++ compiler such as ``g++``, ``clang++``, or ``MSVC`` is required.[0m
[30;1m107 | [0m[35mOn Debian-based systems, this can be installed via ``apt``:[0m
[30;1m108 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m109 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: bash[0m
[30;1m110 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m111 | [0m[35m    sudo apt -y update && sudo apt install -y g++ libomp-dev[0m
[30;1m112 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m113 | [0m[35mwhere ``libomp-dev`` is included to also install OpenMP.[0m

[30;1m49 | [0m[35m            two kernels: ``"Local"`` and ``"NonZeroRandom"``.[0m
[30;1m50 | [0m[35m            The local kernel conducts a bit-flip local transition between states.[0m
[30;1m51 | [0m[35m            The local kernel generates a random qubit site and then generates a random[0m
[30;1m52 | [0m[35m            number to determine the new bit at that qubit site. The ``"NonZeroRandom"`` kernel[0m
[30;1m53 | [0m[35m            randomly transits between states that have nonzero probability.[0m
[30;1m54 | [0m[35m        num_burnin (int): number of MCMC steps that will be dropped. Increasing this value will[0m
[30;1m55 | [0m[35m            result in a closer approximation but increased runtime.[0m
